title: Sichuan cucumber salad
ingredients: ['2 cucumbers, peeled, seeded and cut into 5cm strips', '5 dried red chillies', '1 spring onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon dark brown soft sugar', '5 teaspoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '2 teaspoons hot chilli oil', '1/2 teaspoon Chinese black vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon toasted white sesame seeds']
